description.lang: AXIS T8343 Alert Button is a wireless push button which relays events such as notification messages, illumination and much more. With its support for wireless input/output connectivity, the alert button can communicate wirelessly with AXIS M5065 PTZ Network camera or other connected Z-Wave Plus controllers, creating a small security solution with less cabling. Thanks to its integrated wireless I/O connectivity, AXIS T8343 enables flexible installation as the relay can easily be moved and adapted to your needs.

Association with 4 nodes (i.e. end devices such as smart plugs and other lighting controllers).This allows the On/Off module to receive commands directly from these end devices without the participation of the controller.
